## get_country_names()

This method retrieves a list of all countries. 
```{r,echo=FALSE}
get_country_names()
```

## req_stamen_map()

This method returns stamen map of country
```{r,echo=FALSE}
req_stamen_map(-73.987235, -33.768378, -34.729993, 5.244486, 5,"terrain")
```

## get_country_coordinates(name)

This method returns the coordinates of a country
```{r,echo=FALSE}
get_country_coordinates("brazil")
```
